body:
The target is poisoned, as if the antipaladin had cast poison, using the antipaladin's level as the caster level.

At 12th level, an antipaladin adds the following cruelties to the list of those that can be selected.
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Poisoned
name: • Poisoned
